website_summaries.verdict: Attractive birthday bags with colors and designs that capture the festive spirit of birthday celebrations.
pros: Designed with birthday graphics and greetings in a variety of prints and sizes
Bags have a shiny finish and bright, bold colors
Don't tend to wrinkle or fall over when packed with gift items
cons: Bottoms of the bags feel somewhat flimsy, but the sides and handles feel reasonably durable

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Very sturdy gift bags. They look exactly like the picture. Love all of the designs except the one with the guitars. Not sure what that has to do with birthdays. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are colorful and cute, each with a festive motif on high-gloss paper. They are made with very thick, sturdy, and heavy-duty paper, and seem to be made to last. I especially like the wide “shoe lace” tie handles on each bag: they’re color coordinated with each bag and give it a nice finishing touch. Add a colorful piece or two of tissue paper inside the bag and you’ve got a great gift presentation.
customer_reviews.author: l.c.h. LA

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! I have 6 grandkids and 6 nieces/nephews that like to send birthday gifts. It’s really nice not paying $3-$4 each for a bag!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great to Have on Hand!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always scrounging for things to wrap gifts up in. These bags are sturdy, multipurpose and decent size. Good to have a stash on hand when needed. I will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Kmw9997

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice quality paper and the bags held up great when used. They were able to handle the weight of the gifts, didn't tear or break.
customer_reviews.author: S. Godinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Assortment of gift Bags
customer_reviews.text: Needed some gift bags for several birthdays coming up. These are colorful and I like all the different sizes. Well made and you can't go wrong with extra gift bags.
customer_reviews.author: Carole D.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift bags to have on hand.
customer_reviews.text: These great gift bags are exactly what I needed to keep in the house for when those 'surprise gifts need to be given' and you aren't prepared. Now you have bags and can grab an item on the way to the party or event where a gift needs to be given.
customer_reviews.author: mimscase

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags come in a variety of sizes, and they are made well . The price point for these bags are great! Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Buy With Confidence!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are exactly as advertised. I was pleasantly surprised upon opening the package at the overall quality for this price point. We have used them for two birthdays(at home), both with heavy gifts, and will be getting many more uses before they are done. Buy With Confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Will Cason

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: They look like good bags. My problem with them is I got the wrong ones and scheduled a return. The replacement was also the wrong ones. I ended up running to the store at the last minute to buy bags
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Great sizing
customer_reviews.text: I was able to have the correct size for each birthday item.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Nice, & assortment will fit different personalities!
customer_reviews.text: As described, so glad I ordered them when I did. I needed a birthday bag for my boyfriend and it worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Brand

customer_reviews.title: Received in perfect condition. Colorful quality bags.
customer_reviews.text: They lay perfectly in the box. Loved the care that was put into sending three gift bags. I will definitely buy from this vendor again!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Shows all the packing paper for the bags in the photo but when I got my packages did not have any paper for the bag and the bag is more boy favor than unisex
customer_reviews.author: charles conger

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bags, reasonable price. Would buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A. Rippel

customer_reviews.title: It's in the bag
customer_reviews.text: There is a nice assortment of bags and colors and I expect to order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Magillil

customer_reviews.title: Picture is misleading - does not include wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed because it only includes the bags, but not the paper. The picture is misleading so just be aware you are only getting bags but not the wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.author: Future Actuary

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: These are great bags - super cute and sturdy. Very happy with seller too. Would get them again.
customer_reviews.author: jenhinkle521

customer_reviews.title: Very nice BIRTHDAY gift bags!
customer_reviews.text: Please notice that these are advertised as “BIRTHDAY” & every single bag has a “birthday” Theme.
customer_reviews.author: Snapper23

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy bags. Good variety of sizes. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about these bags, but was pleasantly impressed when they arrived. Good quality and nice variety of designs.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love that these come in a pack and they are very sturdy bags.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi Parr

customer_reviews.title: Very nice assortment of gift bags.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice sturdy gift bags they have a card attached to the "ribbons". The only thing I wish they included is tissue paper. .But still a good price.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn cole

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift bags
customer_reviews.text: I love to buy gifts and this gift bag set was a pretty assortment and value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, colorful bags
customer_reviews.text: These assorted birthday bags were perfect for gifts of several sizes.
customer_reviews.author: SYNTHIA H MELLON

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy.. several of the bags are fairly large which made this set a great deal...
customer_reviews.author: G Artz

customer_reviews.title: Gift bags galore!
customer_reviews.text: I have five family birthdays in very short order almost immediately following Christmas. The gift bag assortment contained something appropriate for every size gift and every age. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: M.  Lukas

customer_reviews.title: loved
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and was loved by the recipient.
customer_reviews.author: don daggs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Very, very reasonable for the amount and quality! I will buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are high quality and sturdy and the designs are attractive. A very good value!
customer_reviews.author: Sidekick 1999

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Would have preferred more medium bags vs large and more generic vs birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a less expensive way to get gift bags, cheaper than buying them in the store. And they have a good variety.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: I will buy them again for sure!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and loved the mixture designs of the bags!!
customer_reviews.author: RHONDA

customer_reviews.title: Gifting gift bags!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter in law and she was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lana M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of bags for birthdays love the different sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Variety of gift bags.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality bags and a nice variety of patterns and sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kreipe

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I needed large bags for a present that would have been difficult to wrap. The bags are great quality and the exact size I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Mayberry

customer_reviews.title: High quality gift bags
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to have these high quality birthday bags available at home. Loved the variety of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: PMC

customer_reviews.title: Birthday bags
customer_reviews.text: The handles needed to be tied but I loved how colorful they are and the sizes were great.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Saladyga

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety of sizes and options to keep on hand
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Green

customer_reviews.title: Not all prints in my purchase said happy birthday but all had that theme whether it be boy or girl
customer_reviews.text: I needed several sized gift bags for birthday gifts and I found these and worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags
customer_reviews.text: I waited until the last minute to realize we didn't have gift wrap in the house. And we are only doing online ordering and curbside pick up. I found these to be the best value I could find and would arrive with a few days to spare. They showed up on the day they said they would arrive! I was pleased with the quality. I was not expecting them to be as thick and high quality as they were. These were very sturdy and will be able to be used over and over! They were bright and came in a nice variety of sizes. Would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: IdPosh

customer_reviews.title: Great price for beautiful gift bags!
customer_reviews.text: Love the different colorful patterns on the gift bags! Great assortment of sizes and very substantial material/paper. Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Nice collection. I needed some gift bags and these are good quality. They hold up well and are not too flimsy like some gift bags.
customer_reviews.author: Kat1234

customer_reviews.title: Ineeded bags and couldn’t get to dollar store
customer_reviews.text: The selection was poor A couple of bags had guitars on them I can’t fathom what I would use them for the other bags were nice kind of team but they will do the job for birthday presents and such
customer_reviews.author: KA LaMesa

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to have gift bags on hand for last minute gift wrapping and these are perfect...nice sizes and designs. Just what I have been needing and a very reasonable cost for the the amount.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Nanc

customer_reviews.title: A nice assortment of gift bags
customer_reviews.text: A very convenient way to get a bunch of gift bags in assorted patterns and sizes. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, more designs please.
customer_reviews.text: The bags are not flimsy and the sizes are good. Please make more variety packs with different options.
customer_reviews.author: naynaycox

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I now have a bright, colorful, cheery collection of gift bags on hand, saving multiple individual trips to the store. Glad I got these
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: These are terrific!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I bought these without knowing anything about the brand. They are durable, with good coloration! Multiple sizes, coordinated patterns make these easy to use as a group or individually. Wrapped, carried, unwrapped without incident. They can easily be used again! Thanks...
customer_reviews.author: Jan Westfall

customer_reviews.title: Stock up on gift bags at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to stock up on gift bags and these are perfect. I used several for birthday gifts and not only did I have the right selection of sizes but they’re very sturdy - one held a very heavy book with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Ciarfella

customer_reviews.title: Fun and functional
customer_reviews.text: Bagging for kids needs to be both visually stimulating and able to hold toys of irregular sizes. This fits the beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Iris

customer_reviews.title: Gift bags
customer_reviews.text: Several tiny, several large, two medium sized not practical for the casual office gift
customer_reviews.author: Karen McCaulley

customer_reviews.title: WILL THIS HOLD THE ITEMS i AM GIVING
customer_reviews.text: This is going to work perfect for the office Christmas presents to my coworkers. Can't wait to start decorating all the bags!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: These gift bags are a quality product at an affordable price. I would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: DrPat

customer_reviews.title: great price for quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some way not to pay 3 to 5 bucks for bags. these have decant quality, they looks great and saved me money. I recommend this
customer_reviews.author: milad n

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety of gift bags.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bags unfortunately this bag was missing a handle, which beans I can’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color variety of the bags! Beautiful and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bags, very high quality and variety of sizes is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ayula

customer_reviews.title: Good Variety!
customer_reviews.text: Several sizes and patterns that work for either gender! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: LDTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: These bags are actually large enough for 4-year-old birthday gifts, unlike others I've purchased in the past. Also seem to be the best value.
customer_reviews.author: BostonMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality and a lifesaver for last minute gifts!
customer_reviews.author: J. Palmer

product_meta.title: Fzopo Birthday Gift Bag Assortment with Ribbon Handle, 12 Pcs Premium Quality Assorted Sizes Paper Bags Set, XL 13x17x6.5, Large 12x15x4.8, Medium 7x9x4.2 inches, 6 Designs
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY: It's made of heavy paper, with glossy finish. That it is very durable. The bag is really stunning and you can tell just by handling it that it's a high-quality bag but not a cheap type one.

VARIETY PACK: 4 different sizes, Extra Large 13” wide x 17” tall x 6.5” deep, Large 12” wide x 15” tall x 4.8” deep and 10.5” wide x 13” tall x 5.75” deep, Medium 7” wide x 9” tall x 4.2” deep, fit for a lot of gifts or presents of multiple types and different sizes. 6 different designs includes colorful style, whimsical and fun, multi colors they were bright and cheery. Give you more ideas.

GREAT VALUE: Great price for multipack 12 Beautiful and sturdy gift bags. This multipack weight approx to 2.5 pounds. Get the most out of your money! This set includes more large bags than other such similar sets.

QUICK AND EASY: This is a nice way to quickly wrap a gift, without the trouble of wrapping paper. Will make a great bag for those who love to give gifts but don't like to wrap presents. Easy as eating a pie to bring your distinguish gifts to your dear lovers, friends or babies!

MULTIPLE USES: 6 designs including colorful dot, guitar, present, “Happy Birthday” lettering on backgrounds of blue, red, yellow, teal, black, and white. To present your gifts with this everyday bags is very pretty, Perfect for Kids, baby, teens girls and boys, party favor, celebrations,and all occasion.
